item.title: Build a linked hash map in Rust
item.author: ccrysisa
item.description: We're writing it end-to-end in one sitting, with the hope of ending up with a decent understanding of how hash map works, and how you'd make the interface idiomatic Rust. I have tried to make sure I introduce new concepts we come across, so it should be possible to follow whether you're a newcomer to the language or not.
